profile.name: Fatih Özoğlu
profile.title: Front End Web Developer
profile.profileDesc: Electronic Engineer and self-motivated developer, who is willing to learn and create outstanding UI applications.

experiences.jobDesc: I have been working as a freelance front end web developer. I create apps with with HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and ReactJS.
I worked as a project manager for several projects. I helped my team about the topics related Electronic Communication Engineering.
I was responsible for the planning and organization of a team consisting nearly 50 technical staff.

hobbies.hobbyDesc: I love spending time in nature and coping with the challenges of the Mother Earth.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
I love spending time in nature and coping with the challenges of the Mother Earth.

projects.title: React Weather App
projects.desc: A weather app showing current and next 5 day's weather forecast for the selected city.

projects.title: React Portfolio Page
projects.desc: This is the page that you are currently browsing. It is built with ReactJS. You can find my contact info, experiences, skills and projects in it.

projects.title: React Tic-Tac-Toe Game
projects.desc: This is the tic-tac-toe game in ReactJS official tutorial, reacreated with functional components and hooks.

projects.title: React Todo App
projects.desc: This is a todo app created with ReactJS functional components and hooks. You can add items, mark them as 'coompleted', filter them with categories as 'all', 'active', 'completed' and delete them.

projects.title: Javascript Todo App
projects.desc: This is a todo app created with HTML, CSS and Javascript. You can add items, mark them as 'coompleted' and delete them.

projects.title: Flask Finance App
projects.desc: A full stack web application getting stock data from iexcloud.io API and allowing users to sign up/sign in, buy and sell stocks and see their profits, created with Flask/Python.

projects.title: Bootstrap Linkedin Clone
projects.desc: A Linkedin clone is created with Bootstrap 5.

projects.title: Bootstrap Instagram Clone
projects.desc: Instagram timeline clone built with Bootstrap 5.

projects.title: Asian Kitchen Menu Website
projects.desc: A basic Asian restaurant menu with photos, names and ingredients of traditional asian meals. It is possible to filter meals by the country of origin.

projects.title: Binary Calculator
projects.desc: A binary calculator which you can add, subtract, multiply and divide binary numbers. This was a challenge in HAckerRank Javascript 10 Day Challenge.
